questiontext.text: In a two-way ANOVA with factors A and B, there is an interaction as

answer.text: The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error

feedback.text: The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error: Incorrect

answer.text: Both factor A and B have a significant main effect

feedback.text: Both factor A and B have a significant main effect: Incorrect

answer.text: The difference between two levels of factor B depends on the level of factor A

feedback.text: The difference between two levels of factor B depends on the level of factor A: Correct
